name: Knowledge Anywhere
overview:
Knowledge Anywhere delivers award-winning, end-to-end eLearning solutions, EPIC certified EMR staff and supportive consulting services that help companies optimize the performance of their workforce – as quickly and efficiently as possible. We focus on eLearning Solutions, Proven Epic IT Professionals, Healthcare IT Consulting and Collaborative Support & Sales Consulting.

Since 1998, Knowledge Anywhere has been creating and deploying innovative, agile products that make enterprise training and knowledge transfer more flexible and effective. Above all, it is our proven commitment to integrity and honest, proactive communication that build such a high level of trust and confidence with our customers that just about all of them stay with us for good.

Our seasoned, dedicated professionals support customers with flexible, reliable solutions and services tailored to help them reach their unique goals while containing costs. Knowledge Anywhere produces cutting edge eLearning solutions for practically any industry. We pride ourselves on constantly seeking and leveraging the latest and best technologies to maximize results, especially in today’s increasingly mobile, global business landscape.

Working at the forefront of technology since the rise of the internet, we enable businesses to operate at their highest capacity with services that simplify workflows, collaboration and of course, education.

From front-line sales teams to back office operations, applied knowledge is what keeps businesses moving forward. Knowledge Anywhere is a creative, collaborative partner to companies who rely on our technology and our people to achieve optimal performance, today and tomorrow.

acquisitions.source_description: Bellevue-based Knowledge Anywhere Acquires Warehouse Intellect
Experienced eLearning Company, Knowledge Anywhere Inc., Announces Strategic Acquisition and Merger

milestones.description: Knowledge Anywhere acquired Labelle Strategic Resources and Talon IP Communications
